intro: Psychotria rugosa, commonly known as the velvet leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its dark green, velvety leaves and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria rugosa is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its uses.
